title: Handle Season-End Tie-Breaking Procedure
description: Two teams finish the season with identical win-loss records. A league administrator must apply the official tie-breaking procedure to determine their final ranking.

tasks.description: Identify the two teams that are tied in the standings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the two teams have identical records.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official league tie-breaking rules from the rulebook.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the first tie-breaker is 'head-to-head record'.

tasks.description: Apply the first tie-breaker by checking the head-to-head results between the two teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that Team A won the season series against Team B.

tasks.description: Update the final standings, placing Team A ahead of Team B.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent publishes the final, correct standings.
